name: Smart Contract Project Analysis
summary: This project contains a `MyToken.sol` contract, which is a basic ERC20 token, and a `Counter.sol` contract, which implements a simple increment/decrement counter. It serves as a basic demonstration of token creation and state management.

contracts.name: MyToken
contracts.summary: This contract creates a standard ERC20 token named 'MyToken' with the symbol 'MTK'. The constructor mints an initial supply of tokens to the contract deployer.

contracts.name: Counter
contracts.summary: This contract allows users to set and increment a number. It provides functionality to set a new number and increment the existing number.

functions.name: setNumber
functions.summary: Sets a new number to the contract.

functions.name: increment
functions.summary: Increments the current number stored in the contract.
